Parameters: {"nodeType":"nodes-base.whatsApp","config":{"resource":"message","operation":"send","phoneNumberId":"={{ $vars.whatsapp_phone_number_id }}","recipientPhoneNumber":"={{ $vars.my_phone_number }}","textBody":"üö® *High Electricity Usage Alert* üö®

üìä *Today's Usage:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.todayUsage }} kWh
üìà *Last Week Same Day:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.lastWeekUsage }} kWh
üìã *Increase:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.percentageIncrease }}%

üîç *Possible Causes:*
‚Ä¢ Air conditioning running longer due to weather
‚Ä¢ Electric heating/cooling systems working harder
‚Ä¢ Appliances left on (water heater, dryer, dishwasher)
‚Ä¢ New devices or increased usage patterns
‚Ä¢ Faulty appliances consuming more power

‚ö° *Quick Fixes:*
‚Ä¢ Check thermostat settings (adjust by 2-3¬∞C)
‚Ä¢ Turn off unused lights and electronics
‚Ä¢ Run dishwasher/washing machine with full loads
‚Ä¢ Unplug devices not in use
‚Ä¢ Check for appliances running unnecessarily

üí° Monitor usage throughout the day and consider scheduling high-energy tasks during off-peak hours."}}

Parameters: {"nodeType":"nodes-base.openAi","config":{"modelId":"gpt-3.5-turbo","messages":{"values":[{"role":"user","content":"You are an energy efficiency expert. I need you to analyze my electricity usage data and create a WhatsApp message.

1. Identify 3-4 most likely causes for this spike
2. Provide 2-3 quick fixes I can implement today
3. Format as a concise WhatsApp message (under 300 characters)

Keep the tone helpful and actionable. Focus on common household energy drains and practical solutions."}]},"resource":"chat","operation":"message"}}

nodes.purpose: Send WhatsApp message with high usage alert, possible causes and quick fixes

configuration.notes: Sends WhatsApp alert when electricity usage is unusually high with possible causes and quick fixes

parameters.textBody:
üö® *High Electricity Usage Alert* üö®

üìä *Today's Usage:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.todayUsage }} kWh
üìà *Last Week Same Day:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.lastWeekUsage }} kWh
üìã *Increase:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.percentageIncrease }}%

üîç *Possible Causes:*
‚Ä¢ Air conditioning running longer due to weather
‚Ä¢ Electric heating/cooling systems working harder
‚Ä¢ Appliances left on (water heater, dryer, dishwasher)
‚Ä¢ New devices or increased usage patterns
‚Ä¢ Faulty appliances consuming more power

‚ö° *Quick Fixes:*
‚Ä¢ Check thermostat settings (adjust by 2-3¬∞C)
‚Ä¢ Turn off unused lights and electronics
‚Ä¢ Run dishwasher/washing machine with full loads
‚Ä¢ Unplug devices not in use
‚Ä¢ Check for appliances running unnecessarily

üí° Monitor usage throughout the day and consider scheduling high-energy tasks during off-peak hours.

configuration.notes: Compare current electricity usage with last week's data and determine if usage is unusually high (>20% increase)

nodes.purpose: Make a simple GET request to retrieve data from an API

configuration.notes: Retrieve daily electricity usage data from smart meter API to compare with previous week's usage for anomaly detection

nodes.purpose: Send a message to an AI model and get response

configuration.notes: Analyze electricity usage data and generate WhatsApp message with insights about high usage, possible causes, and quick fixes

values.content:
You are an energy efficiency expert. I need you to analyze my electricity usage data and create a WhatsApp message.

Current daily usage: {{ $json.currentUsage }} kWh
Last week's average: {{ $json.lastWeekAverage }} kWh
Usage increase: {{ $json.usageIncrease }}%
Date: {{ $json.date }}

Since my usage is unusually high ({{ $json.usageIncrease }}% above last week), please:
1. Identify 3-4 most likely causes for this spike
2. Provide 2-3 quick fixes I can implement today
3. Format as a concise WhatsApp message (under 300 characters)

Keep the tone helpful and actionable. Focus on common household energy drains and practical solutions.

parameters.textBody:
üö® *High Electricity Usage Alert* üö®

üìä Today's usage: {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.todayUsage }}kWh
üìà Last week: {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.lastWeekUsage }}kWh
üìã Increase: {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.percentageIncrease }}%

üîç *Possible Causes:*
‚Ä¢ HVAC system working harder due to weather
‚Ä¢ Appliances left running (water heater, dryer)
‚Ä¢ Electronics in standby mode
‚Ä¢ Pool/spa equipment running longer
‚Ä¢ EV charging during peak hours

‚ö° *Quick Fixes:*
‚Ä¢ Check thermostat settings (adjust by 2-3¬∞F)
‚Ä¢ Unplug unused electronics
‚Ä¢ Run dishwasher/laundry during off-peak hours
‚Ä¢ Check for lights left on
‚Ä¢ Inspect for malfunctioning appliances

üí° Consider scheduling high-energy tasks for off-peak hours to save costs!

values.content:
You are an energy efficiency expert. I need you to analyze my electricity usage data and create a WhatsApp message.

Current daily usage: {{ $json.currentUsage }} kWh
Last week's average: {{ $json.lastWeekAverage }} kWh
Usage increase: {{ $json.usageIncrease }}%
Date: {{ $json.date }}

Since my usage is unusually high ({{ $json.usageIncrease }}% above last week), please:
1. Identify 3-4 most likely causes for this spike
2. Provide 2-3 quick fixes I can implement today
3. Format as a concise WhatsApp message (under 300 characters)

Keep the tone helpful and actionable. Focus on common household energy drains and practical solutions.
